DOC.brief_title: Safety Inhaled Insulin With Type 1 Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: For All Subjects : Nonsmoking Body mass index < 42 kg/m2 FEV1 great equal 70 % predict , DLco TLC great equal 80 % predict screening , No abnormalities screen pulmonary radiology For Subjects diabetes mellitus : Type 1 type 2 diabetes least 2 year HbA1c great equal 6.6 % less equal 12.0 % For Subjects without abnormality glucose control : No history diabetes Normal result formal glucose tolerance test History chronic obstructive pulmonary disease , asthma , significant pulmonary disease Significant renal , hepatic , cardiac disease Women pregnant , lactate , plan become pregnant Subjects participate study investigational drug within previous 3 month Evidence severe complication diabetes
